net.kuujo.vertigo.output.selector

Interface Selector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllSelector, FieldsSelector, RandomSelector, RoundSelector

    public interface Selector
extends Serializable
    An output selector. Output selectors are the counterparts to input groupings. When an input is used to subscribe to the output of another component, the input's grouping is converted to an output Selector. Each time a message is emitted to the resulting output channel, the selector is used to select which Connections to which to send the message.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Selects a list of connections to which to emit messages.

      • select

        List<Connection> select(JsonMessage message,
                      List<Connection> connections)
        Selects a list of connections to which to emit messages.
        Parameters:
        message - The message being emitted.
        connections - A list of connections from which to select.
        Returns:
        A list of selected connections.
